title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS/Linux; pull, create, and run Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, etc. locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers for the Ollama REST API (PyPI: ollama).

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript SDK for Node & browsers (npm: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models, embeddings, and tool-calling.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (Docker & Node).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters (Maven Central).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem (ollama-rb) wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for model testing.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) for RAG & agent pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: Function-calling, JSON mode, RAG, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Minimal repo benchmarking Ollama embedding models (nomic-embed, mxbai) against sentence-transformers.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that sends selected blocks to a local Ollama model for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats, generates images, and calls tools via Ollama.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code explanation, generation, and refactoring using Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private LLM chats.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local models for note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 GPU instances with user-data bootstrapping.
